tool_description: Get Foursquare data and enable user/merchant interactions.
name: Foursquare
title: Foursquare

api_list.name: getUpdateDetails
api_list.description: Allows you to retrieve update details.

required_parameters.name: updateId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the update to retrieve

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

api_list.name: addCommentToCheckin
api_list.description: Comment on a checkin-in

required_parameters.name: checkinId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the checkin to add a comment to.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: mentions
optional_parameters.description: Mentions in your check-in. This parameter is a semicolon-delimited list of mentions. A single mention is of the form `start,end,userid`, where start is the index of the first character in the shout representing the mention, end is the index of the first character in the shout after the mention, and userid is the userid of the user being mentioned. Character indices in shouts are 0-based.

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: The text of the comment, up to 200 characters.

api_list.name: addItemToList
api_list.description: Allows you to add an item to a list.

required_parameters.name: followedListId
required_parameters.description: Id for a user-created or followed list as well as one of either USER_ID/tips or USER_ID/todos.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: listId
optional_parameters.description: Used in conjuction with itemId, the id for a user created or followed list as well as one of either USER_ID/tips or USER_ID/todos.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: If adding a new tip via text, this can associate a url with the tip.

optional_parameters.name: venueId
optional_parameters.description: A venue to add to the list.

optional_parameters.name: tipId
optional_parameters.description: Used to add a tip to a list. Cannot be used in conjunction with the text and url fields.

optional_parameters.name: itemId
optional_parameters.description: Used in conjuction with listId, the id of an item on that list that we wish to copy to this list.

api_list.name: addList
api_list.description: Allows users to create a new list.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: The description of the list.

optional_parameters.name: photoId
optional_parameters.description: The id of a photo that should be set as the list photo.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Required The name of the list.

optional_parameters.name: collaborative
optional_parameters.description: Boolean indicating if this list can be edited by friends.

api_list.name: addPage
api_list.description: Allows users to create a new page. The creating user is added as a manager of the new page.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the page

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

api_list.name: addPostToCheckin
api_list.description: Post user generated content from an external app to a check-in. This post will be accessible to anyone who can view the details of the check-in.

required_parameters.name: checkinId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the checkin to add a post to.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: Link for more details. This page will be opened in an embedded web view in the foursquare application, unless contentId is specified and a native link handler is registered and present. We support the following URL schemes: http, https, foursquare, mailto, tel, and sms.

optional_parameters.name: contentId
optional_parameters.description: Identifier for the post to be used in a native link, up to 50 characters. A url must also be specified in the request.

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: The text of the post, up to 200 characters.

api_list.name: addTip
api_list.description: Allows you to add a new tip at a venue.

required_parameters.name: venueId
required_parameters.description: The venue where you want to add this tip.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text of the tip, up to 200 characters.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: A URL related to this tip.

optional_parameters.name: broadcast
optional_parameters.description: Whether to broadcast this tip. Send twitter if you want to send to twitter, facebook if you want to send to facebook, or twitter,facebook if you want to send to both.

api_list.name: addVenue
api_list.description: Allows Foursquare users to add a new venue.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: the name of the venue

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The url of the homepage of the venue.

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: The address of the venue.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The city name where this venue is.

optional_parameters.name: primaryCategoryId
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the category to which you want to assign this venue.

optional_parameters.name: zip
optional_parameters.description: The zip or postal code for the venue.

optional_parameters.name: ignoreDuplicatesKey
optional_parameters.description: Required if ignoreDuplicates is true. This key will be available in the response of the HTTP 409 error of the first (failed) attempt to add venue.

optional_parameters.name: twitter
optional_parameters.description: The twitter handle of the venue.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Latitude and longitude of the venue, as accurate as is known. Format: `lat,lng`. Example: `40.7,-74`

optional_parameters.name: crossStreet
optional_parameters.description: The nearest intersecting street or streets.

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: The phone number of the venue.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: A freeform description of the venue, up to 160 characters.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: The nearest state or province to the venue.

optional_parameters.name: ignoreDuplicates
optional_parameters.description: A boolean flag telling the server to ignore duplicates and force the addition of this venue.

api_list.name: changeSingleSetting
api_list.description: Change a setting for the given user.

required_parameters.name: settingId
required_parameters.description: Name of setting to change, sendMayorshipsToTwitter, sendBadgesToTwitter, sendMayorshipsToFacebook, sendBadgesToFacebook, receivePings, receiveCommentPings.

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: true, or false.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

api_list.name: claimVenue
api_list.description: Claim a venue for the user. If your OAuth Consumer is set up with the proper privileges, you can use this endpoint to claim a venue on behalf of a user without the claim having to be approved by foursquare staff.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: visible
optional_parameters.description: (optional, default `true`) whether role as manager is visible on the venue page

api_list.name: createCheckin
api_list.description: Allows you to check in to a place.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: venueId
required_parameters.description: The venue where the user is checking in. Find venue IDs by searching or from historical APIs.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Latitude and longitude of the user's location. Only specify this field if you have a GPS or other device reported location for the user at the time of check-in. Format: `lat,lng`. Example: `40.7,-74`

optional_parameters.name: eventId
optional_parameters.description: The event the user is checking in to.

optional_parameters.name: altitude
optional_parameters.description: Altitude of the user's location, in meters.

optional_parameters.name: mentions
optional_parameters.description: Mentions in your check-in. This parameter is a semicolon-delimited list of mentions. A single mention is of the form `start,end,userid`, where start is the index of the first character in the shout representing the mention, end is the index of the first character in the shout after the mention, and userid is the userid of the user being mentioned. If userid is prefixed with 'fbu-', this indicates a Facebook userid that is being mention. Character indices in shouts are 0-based.

optional_parameters.name: altitudeAccuracy
optional_parameters.description: Accuracy of the user's altitude, in meters.

optional_parameters.name: locationAccuracy
optional_parameters.description: Accuracy of latitude and longitude, in meters.

optional_parameters.name: shout
optional_parameters.description: A message about your check-in. The maximum length of this field is 140 characters.

optional_parameters.name: broadcast
optional_parameters.description: Who to broadcast this check-in to. Accepts a comma-delimited list of values: `private`, `public`, `facebook`, `twitter`, `followers`

api_list.name: deleteItemFromList
api_list.description: Allows you to delete items from a list. One of itemId, venueId, or tipId must be provided.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: listId
required_parameters.description: Id for a user-created or followed list or one of either USER_ID/tips or USER_ID/todos.

optional_parameters.name: tipId
optional_parameters.description: Id of a tip to be deleted.

optional_parameters.name: itemId
optional_parameters.description: Id of the item to delete.

optional_parameters.name: venueId
optional_parameters.description: Id of a venue to be deleted. If the venue is on the list multiple times, e.g. multiple tips at the same venue, all items will be removed.

api_list.name: dislikeVenue
api_list.description: Allows the acting user to dislike for a venue.

required_parameters.name: venueId
required_parameters.description: The venue to dislike for

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

api_list.name: findUsers
api_list.description: Helps a user locate friends.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of phone numbers to look for.

optional_parameters.name: facebookIds
optional_parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of Facebook ID's to look for.

optional_parameters.name: twitter
optional_parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of Twitter handles to look for.

optional_parameters.name: onlyPages
optional_parameters.description: (default false) Indicates whether to only return pages. This replaces the functionality of the old dedicated pages/search endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: A single string to search for in users' names.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of email addresses to look for.

optional_parameters.name: twitterSource
optional_parameters.description: A single Twitter handle. Results will be users that this handle follows on Twitter who use Foursquare.

api_list.name: flagTip
api_list.description: Allows the acting user to flag a tip as offensive, spam, or not relevant.

required_parameters.name: tipId
required_parameters.description: The tip to flag.

required_parameters.name: problem
required_parameters.description: The specific problem with the tip. Must be one of `offensive`, `spam`, or `nolongerrelevant`.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: comment
optional_parameters.description: A comment explaining the flag.

api_list.name: flagVenue
api_list.description: Allows users to indicate a venue is incorrect in some way.

required_parameters.name: venueId
required_parameters.description: The venue id for which an edit is being proposed.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: problem
required_parameters.description: One of `mislocated`, `closed`, `duplicate`, `inappropriate`, `doesnt_exist`, `event_over`

optional_parameters.name: dublicatedVenue
optional_parameters.description: ID of the duplicated venue (for problem `duplicate`)

api_list.name: followList
api_list.description: Allows you to follow a list.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: listId
required_parameters.description: Id of a user-created list.

api_list.name: getAccessToken
api_list.description: Access tokens allow apps to make requests to Foursquare on the behalf of a user. Each access token is unique to the user and consumer key.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

required_parameters.name: redirectUri
required_parameters.description: Application redirect url.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: The authorization code.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

api_list.name: getCheckin
api_list.description: Get details of a check-in.

required_parameters.name: checkinId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the check-in to retrieve additional information for.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

api_list.name: getEventCategories
api_list.description: Returns a hierarchical list of categories applied to events.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

api_list.name: getListFollowers
api_list.description: Returns a count and items of users following this list.

required_parameters.name: listId
required_parameters.description: Id for a user-created list

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

api_list.name: getListItem
api_list.description: Gives details about a list item

required_parameters.name: itemId
required_parameters.description: Id for an item in the parent list.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: listId
required_parameters.description: Id for a user-created or followed list.

api_list.name: getListsTipAppears
api_list.description: The lists that this tip appears on.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

required_parameters.name: tipId
required_parameters.description: Identity of a tip to get lists for.

optional_parameters.name: group
optional_parameters.description: can be `created`, `edited`, `followed`, `friends`, `other`. If no acting user is present, only other is supported.

api_list.name: getNextVenues
api_list.description: Returns venues that people often check in to after the current venue. Up to 5 venues are returned in each query, and results are sorted by how many people have visited that venue after the current one. Homes are never returned in results.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

required_parameters.name: venueId
required_parameters.description: ID of the venue you want to see next venue information about

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

api_list.name: getNotificationUpdates
api_list.description: Retrieve a user's notification tray notifications

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return, up to 99. Notifications are grouped over time, so there will usually be fewer than 99 results available at any given time. offset 0 Used to page through results. Only the 99 most recent notifications are visible, so offset must be no more than 99 - limit.

api_list.name: getPageAccessToken
api_list.description: Returns an OAuth access token for the specified page. The requesting user must be a manager of the page.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: The page you want similar pages for.

api_list.name: getPageUpdates
api_list.description: Returns a list of page updates created by the current user.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

api_list.name: getPageVenues
api_list.description: Allows you to get the page's venues.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

required_parameters.name: pageId
required_parameters.description: The page whose venues to get venues for

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The offset of which venues to return. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Can be used when including ll. Not valid with ne or sw. Limit results to venues within this many meters of the specified ll. The maximum supported radius is currently 100,000 meters.

optional_parameters.name: storeId
optional_parameters.description: Only return venues whose storeId matches. storeIds are defined by the page manager (and therefore namespaced to that particular page). They are the page's own internal identifier for that venue. *Cannot be used with any geo params*.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Not valid with ne or sw. Limits results to venues near this latitude and longitude within an optional radius.

optional_parameters.name: northEast
optional_parameters.description: See `southWest`.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of venues to return. Defaults to 20, max of 100.

optional_parameters.name: southWest
optional_parameters.description: Example: `44.3,37.2`. With northEast, limits results to the bounding quadrangle defined by the latitude and longitude given by sw as its south-west corner, and ne as its north-east corner. The bounding quadrangle is only supported for intent=browse searches. Not valid with ll or radius. Bounding quadrangles with an area up to approximately 10,000 square kilometers are supported.

api_list.name: getPageVenuesTimeSeriesData
api_list.description: Get daily venue stats for venues managed by a page over a time range.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: startAt
required_parameters.description: The start of the time range to retrieve stats for (seconds since epoch).

required_parameters.name: pageId
required_parameters.description: The page whose venues to get timeseries data for

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Specifies which fields to return. May be one or more of totalCheckins, newCheckins, uniqueVisitors, sharing, genders, ages, hours, separated by commas.

optional_parameters.name: endAt
optional_parameters.description: The end of the time range to retrieve stats for (seconds since epoch). If omitted, the current time is assumed.

api_list.name: getPendingFriendRequests
api_list.description: Shows a user the list of users with whom they have a pending friend request (i.e., someone tried to add the acting user as a friend, but the acting user has not accepted).

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

api_list.name: getPhoto
api_list.description: Get details of a photo.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: photoId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the photo to retrieve additional information for.

api_list.name: getRecentFriendsCheckins
api_list.description: Returns a list of recent checkins from friends.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: afterTimestamp
optional_parameters.description: Seconds after which to look for checkins, e.g. for looking for new checkins since the last fetch. If more than limit results are new since then, this is ignored. Checkins created prior to this timestamp will still be returned if they have new comments or photos, making it easier to poll for all new activity.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Latitude and longitude of the user's location, so response can include distance. Format: `lat,lng`. Example: `40.7,-74`

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return, up to 100.

api_list.name: getRecommendedVenues
api_list.description: Returns a list of recommended venues near the current location.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

optional_parameters.name: sortByDistance
optional_parameters.description: Boolean flag to sort the results by distance instead of relevance. Example: `1`

optional_parameters.name: locationAccuracy
optional_parameters.description: Accuracy of latitude and longitude, in meters. (Does not currently affect search results.)

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description: Pass `any` to retrieve results for any time of day. Omitting this parameter returns results targeted to the current time of day.

optional_parameters.name: specials
optional_parameters.description: Boolean flag to only include venues that have a special.

optional_parameters.name: novelty
optional_parameters.description: Pass `new `or `old` to limit results to places the acting user hasn't been or has been, respectively. Omitting this parameter returns a mixture of old and new venues.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Radius to search within, in meters. If radius is not specified, a suggested radius will be used based on the density of venues in the area.

optional_parameters.name: altitudeAccuracy
optional_parameters.description: Accuracy of the user's altitude, in meters. (Does not currently affect search results.)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return, up to 50.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Required unless near is provided: Latitude and longitude of the user's location. Format: `lat,lng`. Example: `40.7,-74`

optional_parameters.name: venuePhotos
optional_parameters.description: Boolean flag to include a photo in the response for each venue, if one is available. Default is `0` (no photos). Photos are returned as part of the venue JSON object.

optional_parameters.name: openNow
optional_parameters.description: Boolean flag to only include venues that are open now. This prefers official provider hours but falls back to popular check-in hours.

optional_parameters.name: price
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of price points. Currently the valid range of price points are [1,2,3,4], 1 being the least expensive, 4 being the most expensive. For food venues, in the United States, 1 is < $10 an entree, 2 is $10-$20 an entree, 3 is $20-$30 an entree, 4 is > $30 an entree.

optional_parameters.name: friendVisits
optional_parameters.description: Pass `visited` or `notvisited` to limit results to places the acting user's friends have or haven't been, respectively. Omitting this parameter returns a mixture of venues to which the user's friends have or haven't been.

optional_parameters.name: saved
optional_parameters.description: Boolean flag to only include venues that the user has saved on their To-Do list or to another list.

optional_parameters.name: altitude
optional_parameters.description: Altitude of the user's location, in meters. (Does not currently affect search results.)

optional_parameters.name: near
optional_parameters.description: Required unless location is provided:  A string naming a place in the world. If the near string is not geocodable, returns a failed_geocode error. Otherwise, searches within the bounds of the geocode. Adds a geocode object to the response. (Required for query searches)

optional_parameters.name: lastVenue
optional_parameters.description: A venue ID to use in combination with the intent=nextVenues parameter, which returns venues users often visit after a given venue. If intent=nextVenues is specified but lastVenue is not, the user's last check-in will be used if it is within 2 hours. If the user has not checked in within the last 2 hours, no results will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Used to page through results.

optional_parameters.name: section
optional_parameters.description: One of `food`, `drinks`, `coffee`, `shops`, `arts`, `outdoors`, `sights`, `trending` or `specials`, `nextVenues` (venues frequently visited after a given venue), or topPicks (a mix of recommendations generated without a query from the user). Choosing one of these limits results to venues with the specified category or property.

optional_parameters.name: day
optional_parameters.description: Pass `any` to retrieve results for any day of the week. Omitting this parameter returns results targeted to the current day of the week.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: A search term to be applied against venue names.

api_list.name: getSimilarVenues
api_list.description: Returns a list of venues similar to the specified venue.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: venueId
required_parameters.description: The venue you want similar venues for.

api_list.name: getSingleEvent
api_list.description: Get details of a event.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: eventId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the event to retrieve additional information for.

api_list.name: getSingleList
api_list.description: Gives details about a list.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: listId
required_parameters.description: Id for a user-created (e.g. /v2/lists/12381902N) or followed list or one of either USER_ID/tips (e.g. /v2/lists/32/tips) or USER_ID/todos.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sorts the list items. Possible values are recent and nearby. recent sorts the list items by the date added to the list. nearby sorts the list items by the distance from the center of the provided llBounds.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return, up to 200.

optional_parameters.name: locationBounds
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip. Used to page through results. Example: `30.13800,-98.16009,30.40485,-97.28118`

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip. Used to page through results.

optional_parameters.name: categoryId
optional_parameters.description: Restricts the returned results to venues matching the input category id.

api_list.name: getSinglePageUpdate
api_list.description: Get page update details.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: updateId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the update to retrieve additional information for.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of nearby venues to show (default 20).

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: The location of the current user.

api_list.name: getSingleSetting
api_list.description: Returns a setting for the acting user.

required_parameters.name: settingId
required_parameters.description: The name of a setting.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

api_list.name: getSingleVenue
api_list.description: Gives details about a venue, including location, mayorship, tags, tips, specials, and category.

required_parameters.name: venueId
required_parameters.description: ID of venue to retrieve

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

api_list.name: getSuggestedCompletion
api_list.description: Returns a list of mini-venues partially matching the search term, near the location.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: A search term to be applied against titles. Must be at least 3 characters long.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

optional_parameters.name: near
optional_parameters.description: Required unless location is provided:  A string naming a place in the world. If the near string is not geocodable, returns a failed_geocode error. Otherwise, searches within the bounds of the geocode. Adds a geocode object to the response. (Required for query searches)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return, up to 100.

optional_parameters.name: southWest
optional_parameters.description: Example: `44.3,37.2`. With northEast, limits results to the bounding quadrangle defined by the latitude and longitude given by sw as its south-west corner, and ne as its north-east corner. The bounding quadrangle is only supported for intent=browse searches. Not valid with ll or radius. Bounding quadrangles with an area up to approximately 10,000 square kilometers are supported.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Required unless near is provided: Latitude and longitude of the user's location. Format: `lat,lng`. Example: `40.7,-74`

optional_parameters.name: locationAccuracy
optional_parameters.description: Accuracy of latitude and longitude, in meters. (Does not currently affect search results.)

optional_parameters.name: northEast
optional_parameters.description: See `southWest`.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Limit results to venues within this many meters of the specified location. Defaults to a city-wide area. The maximum supported radius is currently 80,000 meters.

api_list.name: getTip
api_list.description: Gives details about a tip, including which users (especially friends) have marked the tip to-do.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: tipId
required_parameters.description: ID of tip to retrieve

api_list.name: getTrendingVenues
api_list.description: Returns a list of venues near the current location with the most people currently checked in.

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: Location of the user. Format: `lat,lng`. Example: `40.7,-74`

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Radius in meters, up to approximately 2000 meters.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return, up to 50.

api_list.name: getUser
api_list.description: Returns profile information for a given user, including selected mayorships.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: Identity of the user to get details for. Pass `self` to get details of the acting user.

api_list.name: getUserCheckins
api_list.description: Returns a history of checkins for the authenticated user.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: For now, only `self` is supported

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: afterTimestamp
optional_parameters.description: Retrieve the first results to follow these seconds since epoch. This should be useful for paging forward in time, or when polling for changes. To avoid missing results when polling, we recommend subtracting several seconds from the last poll time and then de-duplicating.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip. Used to page through results.

optional_parameters.name: beforeTimestamp
optional_parameters.description: Retrieve the first results prior to these seconds since epoch. Useful for paging backward in time.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return, up to 250.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: How to sort the returned checkins. Can be `newestfirst` or `oldestfirst`.

required_parameters.description: Identity of the user to get friends of. Pass `self` to get friends of the acting user.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return, up to 500.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Used to page through results.

api_list.name: getUserLikedVenues

optional_parameters.name: afterTimestamp
optional_parameters.description: Seconds after epoch.

optional_parameters.name: beforeTimestamp
optional_parameters.description: Seconds since epoch.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Used to page through results.

optional_parameters.name: categoryId
optional_parameters.description: Limits returned venues to those in this category. If specifying a top-level category, all sub-categories will also match the query.

api_list.name: getUserLists

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: Identity of the user to get lists for. Pass `self` to get lists of the acting user.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return, up to 200.

optional_parameters.name: group
optional_parameters.description: Can be `created` (lists created by this user), `edited` (other people's lists this user has edited), `followed` (lists this user follows), `friends` (lists from this user's friends), and `suggested` (lists relevant to the user's current location).

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Location of the user, required in order to receive the suggested group. Format: `lat,lng`. Example: `40.7,-74`

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip. Used to page through results.

Pass checkin for venue photos from friends (including non-public photos from recent checkins), ordered by recency. See our documentation on photos for information on how to handle the response and construct actual photo URLs.

api_list.description: Allows you to move an item on a list. One of beforeId or afterId must be specified.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: itemId
required_parameters.description: Id of the item on this list to move.

required_parameters.name: listId
required_parameters.description: Id of a user-created list.

optional_parameters.name: afterId
optional_parameters.description: Move `itemId` after `afterId`.

optional_parameters.name: beforeId
optional_parameters.description: Move `itemId` before `beforeId`.

api_list.name: proposeVenueChange
api_list.description: If the user knows the correct venue information, use this method to save it. Otherwise, use flag to flag the venue instead (you need not specify new venue info in that case).

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: venueId
required_parameters.description: The venue id for which an edit is being proposed.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: The nearest state or province to the venue.

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: The phone number of the venue.

optional_parameters.name: crossStreet
optional_parameters.description: The nearest intersecting street or streets.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the venue.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: A freeform description of the venue, up to 300 characters.

optional_parameters.name: addCategoryIds
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of new category IDs to be assigned to this venue. If you are adding a new category to a venue and you want to make it primary, you should just use primaryCategoryId.

optional_parameters.name: venueLocation
optional_parameters.description: Latitude and longitude at which the venue should be located. Example: `44.3,37.2`

optional_parameters.name: menuUrl
optional_parameters.description: A url where the menu of the venue can be found.

optional_parameters.name: hours
optional_parameters.description: The hours for the venue, as a semi-colon separated list of open segments and named segments (e.g., brunch or happy hour). Open segments are formatted as day,start,end. Named segments additionally have a label, formatted as day,start,end,label. Days are formatted as integers with Monday = 1,...,Sunday = 7. Start and End are formatted as [+]HHMM format. Use 24 hour format (no colon), prefix with 0 for HH or MM less than 10. Use '+' prefix, i.e., +0230 to represent 2:30 am past midnight into the following day.

optional_parameters.name: twitter
optional_parameters.description: The twitter handle of the venue.

optional_parameters.name: facebookUrl
optional_parameters.description: The url for this venue's Facebook Page.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The city name where this venue is.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The url of the homepage of the venue.

optional_parameters.name: removeCategoryIds
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of new category IDs to be removed from this venue.

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: The address of the venue.

optional_parameters.name: zip
optional_parameters.description: The zip or postal code for the venue.

optional_parameters.name: primaryCategoryId
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the category to which you want to assign this venue.

api_list.name: removeCommentFromCheckin
api_list.description: Remove a comment from a checkin, if the acting user is the author or the owner of the checkin.

required_parameters.description: The ID of the checkin to remove a comment from.

required_parameters.name: commentId
required_parameters.description: The id of the comment to remove.

required_parameters.name: accessToken

api_list.name: resolvePublicCheckinFromUrl
api_list.description: Check-ins that are posted to public feeds such as Twitter do not reveal the associated check-in's ID. Use this endpoint to map from a check-in URL (e.g., https://www.swarmapp.com/c/fcP5m3yn7AL) to check-in details.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: shortId
required_parameters.description: The short ID at the end of a swarmapp.com link, e.g., https://swarmapp.com/c/abc123ZYX

api_list.name: searchEvents
api_list.description: This is an experimental API and subject to change or breakage.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Identifier for a known third-party event provider. This is used in conjunction with id. Currently songkick.com is the only supported value.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

optional_parameters.name: eventId
optional_parameters.description: Identifier used by third-party specifed in domain, which we will attempt to match against our events listings. eventId is the id of an event, participantId is the id of a participant, like a band or sports team.

optional_parameters.name: participantId
optional_parameters.description: Identifier used by third-party specifed in domain, which we will attempt to match against our events listings. eventId is the id of an event, participantId is the id of a participant, like a band or sports team.

api_list.name: searchSpecials
api_list.description: Returns a list of specials near the current location.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Limit results to venues within this many meters of the specified location. Defaults to a city-wide area.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return, up to 50.

optional_parameters.name: altitude
optional_parameters.description: Altitude of the user's location, in meters.

optional_parameters.name: altitudeAccuracy
optional_parameters.description: Accuracy of the user's altitude, in meters.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Latitude and longitude to search near. Format: `lat,lng`. Example: `40.7,-74`

optional_parameters.name: locationAccuracy
optional_parameters.description: Accuracy of latitude and longitude, in meters.

api_list.name: searchVenues
api_list.description: Returns a list of venues near the current location, optionally matching a search term.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: Application client id.

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: Application client secret key.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Required unless near is provided: Latitude and longitude of the user's location. Format: `lat,lng`. Example: `40.7,-74`

optional_parameters.name: altitudeAccuracy
optional_parameters.description: Accuracy of the user's altitude, in meters. (Does not currently affect search results.)

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: A third-party URL which we will attempt to match against our map of venues to URLs.

optional_parameters.name: locationAccuracy
optional_parameters.description: Accuracy of latitude and longitude, in meters. (Does not currently affect search results.)

optional_parameters.name: northEast
optional_parameters.description: See `southWest`.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Limit results to venues within this many meters of the specified location. Defaults to a city-wide area. Only valid for requests with intent=browse, or requests with intent=checkin and categoryId or query. Does not apply to match intent requests. The maximum supported radius is currently 100,000 meters.

optional_parameters.name: linkedId
optional_parameters.description: 1002207971611 Identifier used by third party specified in `providerId`, which we will attempt to match against our map of venues to URLs.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return, up to 50.

optional_parameters.name: altitude
optional_parameters.description: Altitude of the user's location, in meters. (Does not currently affect search results.)

optional_parameters.name: providerId
optional_parameters.description: Identifier for a known third party that is part of our map of venues to URLs, used in conjunction with `linkedId`.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: A search term to be applied against venue names.

optional_parameters.name: near
optional_parameters.description: Required unless location is provided:  A string naming a place in the world. If the near string is not geocodable, returns a failed_geocode error. Otherwise, searches within the bounds of the geocode. Adds a geocode object to the response. (Required for query searches)

optional_parameters.name: intent
optional_parameters.description: One of the values below, indicating your intent in performing the search. If no value is specified, defaults to `checkin`. See README for more info.

optional_parameters.name: southWest
optional_parameters.description: Example: `44.3,37.2`. With northEast, limits results to the bounding quadrangle defined by the latitude and longitude given by sw as its south-west corner, and ne as its north-east corner. The bounding quadrangle is only supported for intent=browse searches. Not valid with ll or radius. Bounding quadrangles with an area up to approximately 10,000 square kilometers are supported.

optional_parameters.name: categoryId
optional_parameters.description: A comma separated list of categories to limit results to. If you specify categoryId specifying a radius may improve results. If specifying a top-level category, all sub-categories will also match the query. Does not apply to match intent requests.

required_parameters.name: accessToken

required_parameters.name: listId

optional_parameters.name: message
optional_parameters.description: A personal note to include with the share.

api_list.name: updateListItem
api_list.description:
Allows you to add or remove photos and tips from items on user-created lists. 
*Note:* Only valid on user-created lists 
*Note:* Collaborators can only update items they added. List owners can not update any item.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

required_parameters.name: listId
required_parameters.description: Id for a user-created list.

optional_parameters.name: itemId
optional_parameters.description: Id of the item to update.

optional_parameters.name: photoId
optional_parameters.description: If present and a non-empty value, adds a photo to this item. If present and empty, will remove the photo on this item. If the photo was a private checkin photo, it will be promoted to a public venue photo.

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: If present creates a public tip on the venue and replaces any existing tip on the item. Cannot be used in conjuction with tipId or photoId

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: If adding a new tip via text, this can associate a url with the tip.

optional_parameters.name: tipId
optional_parameters.description: If present and a non-empty value, adds or replaces a tip on this item. If present and empty, will remove the tip on this item.

api_list.name: updateUserPhoto
api_list.description: Updates the user's profile photo.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: photo
optional_parameters.description: Photo under `100KB` in multipart MIME encoding with content type `image/jpeg`, `image/gif`, or `image/png`.

api_list.name: updatesList
api_list.description: Allows you to update a list.

required_parameters.name: listId
required_parameters.description: Id for a user-created list.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: Access Token obtained from Foursquare OAuth.

optional_parameters.name: photoId
optional_parameters.description: If present and a non-empty value, updates the List photo. If present and empty, will remove the List photo.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: If present and a non-empty value, updates the List description. If present and empty, will remove the List description.

optional_parameters.name: collaborative
optional_parameters.description: Boolean indicating if this list can be edited by friends. Once this has been set to true for a list, authenticated friends can edit the list via additem, deleteitem, etc.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: If present and a non-empty value, updates the List name.
